languages.text: {n}Маршал Стракс, не дожидаясь, когда к нему обратятся, не столько просит, сколько приказывает:{/n} "Судите меня, {name}. Теперь, когда пыль улеглась, я вижу картину ясно. Вультур использовала меня и Арбитес, чтобы единолично управлять вашим протекторатом. Я думал, что действую на благо Лекса, но пользу я приносил лишь одному человеку. Это непростительно, и я заслужил кару".

traits.locale_text: {n}Маршал Стракс, не дожидаясь, когда к нему обратятся, не столько просит, сколько приказывает:{/n} "Судите меня, {name}. Теперь, когда пыль улеглась, я вижу картину ясно. Вультур использовала меня и Арбитес, чтобы единолично управлять вашим протекторатом. Я думал, что действую на благо Лекса, но пользу я приносил лишь одному человеку. Это непростительно, и я заслужил кару".
traits.speaker: VC2_ArbitresMarshal

languages.text: {n}Without waiting for you to address him, Marshal Strachs does not plead so much as give you an order:{/n} "Judge me, {name}. Now that the dust has settled, I can see everything clearly. Vultur used me and the Adeptus Arbites in an attempt to seize total control over your protectorate. I thought my actions were in service to the Lex, but in truth, only one person has ever benefitted from them. That mistake deserves no pardon, and I have earned my punishment."
languages.original_text: {n}Маршал Стракс, не дожидаясь, когда к нему обратятся, не столько просит, сколько приказывает:{/n} "Судите меня, {name}. Теперь, когда пыль улеглась, я вижу картину ясно. Вультур использовала меня и Арбитес, чтобы единолично управлять вашим протекторатом. Я думал, что действую на благо Лекса, но пользу я приносил лишь одному человеку. Это непростительно, и я заслужил кару".

Vultur used me and the Adeptus Arbites in an attempt to seize total control over your protectorate. I thought my actions were in service to the Lex, but in truth, only one person has ever benefitted from them. That mistake deserves no pardon, and I have earned my punishment."

languages.text: {n}Ohne darauf zu warten, dass du ihn persönlich ansprichst, erteilt die Marschall Strachs einen Befehl:{/n} "Richtet über mich, {name}. Nun, da sich der Staub gelegt hat, sehe ich absolut klar. Vultur hat mich und das Adeptus Arbites missbraucht, um die totale Kontrolle über Euer Protektorat zu erlangen. Ich dachte, ich würde im Sinne des Lex handeln, aber tatsächlich hat nur eine Person von meinem Tun profitiert. Dieser Fehler verdient keine Gnade und ich verdiene es, bestraft zu werden."
languages.original_text: {n}Without waiting for you to address him, Marshal Strachs does not plead so much as give you an order:{/n} "Judge me, {name}. Now that the dust has settled, I can see everything clearly. Vultur used me and the Adeptus Arbites in an attempt to seize total control over your protectorate. I thought my actions were in service to the Lex, but in truth, only one person has ever benefitted from them. That mistake deserves no pardon, and I have earned my punishment."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ohne darauf zu warten, dass du ihn persönlich ansprichst, erteilt die Marschall Strachs einen Befehl:{/n} "Richtet über mich, {name}. Nun, da sich der Staub gelegt hat, sehe ich absolut klar. Vultur hat mich und das Adeptus Arbites missbraucht, um die totale Kontrolle über Euer Protektorat zu erlangen. Ich dachte, ich würde im Sinne des Lex handeln, aber tatsächlich hat nur eine Person von meinem Tun profitiert. Dieser Fehler verdient keine Gnade und ich verdiene es, bestraft zu werden."

languages.text: {n}Sans attendre que vous lui adressiez la parole, le maréchal Strachs vous fait une demande qui ressemble davantage à un ordre :{/n} « Jugez-moi, {name}. Maintenant que le calme est revenu, la situation m'apparaît clairement. Vultur s'est servie de moi et de l'Adeptus Arbites pour tenter de prendre le contrôle de votre protectorat. Je croyais remplir mon devoir envers la Lex, mais en réalité, mes actes n'ont été bénéfiques qu'à une seule personne. Une telle erreur ne mérite pas le pardon, seulement la sanction. »
languages.original_text: {n}Without waiting for you to address him, Marshal Strachs does not plead so much as give you an order:{/n} "Judge me, {name}. Now that the dust has settled, I can see everything clearly. Vultur used me and the Adeptus Arbites in an attempt to seize total control over your protectorate. I thought my actions were in service to the Lex, but in truth, only one person has ever benefitted from them. That mistake deserves no pardon, and I have earned my punishment."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sans attendre que vous lui adressiez la parole, le maréchal Strachs vous fait une demande qui ressemble davantage à un ordre :{/n} « Jugez-moi, {name}. Maintenant que le calme est revenu, la situation m'apparaît clairement. Vultur s'est servie de moi et de l'Adeptus Arbites pour tenter de prendre le contrôle de votre protectorat. Je croyais remplir mon devoir envers la Lex, mais en réalité, mes actes n'ont été bénéfiques qu'à une seule personne. Une telle erreur ne mérite pas le pardon, seulement la sanction. »

languages.text: {n}还没等你开口，斯塔克斯元帅就开了口。他的话不像是在恳求，更像是在传达命令。{/n}“审判我吧，{name}。如今尘埃落定，所有的事情我终于看清了。沃尔图尔利用了我和帝国法务部，打算篡夺你的王朝。我本以为，我所做的一切都是为了帝国律法，但实际上，这件事情从头到尾，获益的人只有一个。我犯下的罪行不值得原谅，我理当受到惩罚。”
languages.original_text: {n}Without waiting for you to address him, Marshal Strachs does not plead so much as give you an order:{/n} "Judge me, {name}. Now that the dust has settled, I can see everything clearly. Vultur used me and the Adeptus Arbites in an attempt to seize total control over your protectorate. I thought my actions were in service to the Lex, but in truth, only one person has ever benefitted from them. That mistake deserves no pardon, and I have earned my punishment."

traits.locale_text: {n}还没等你开口，斯塔克斯元帅就开了口。他的话不像是在恳求，更像是在传达命令。{/n}“审判我吧，{name}。如今尘埃落定，所有的事情我终于看清了。沃尔图尔利用了我和帝国法务部，打算篡夺你的王朝。我本以为，我所做的一切都是为了帝国律法，但实际上，这件事情从头到尾，获益的人只有一个。我犯下的罪行不值得原谅，我理当受到惩罚。”

languages.text: {n}Sin darte tiempo a dirigirle la palabra, el Mariscal Strachs no suplica, si no que más bien te da una orden:{/n} «Júzgueme, {name}. Ahora que todo ha terminado, veo las cosas con claridad. Vultur nos usó a mí y al Adeptus Arbites para intentar apoderarse de su protectorado. Pensaba que estaba actuando al servicio de la Lex, pero en realidad solo una persona se ha beneficiado de mis acciones. Es un error que no merece perdón y me merezco el castigo».
languages.original_text: {n}Without waiting for you to address him, Marshal Strachs does not plead so much as give you an order:{/n} "Judge me, {name}. Now that the dust has settled, I can see everything clearly. Vultur used me and the Adeptus Arbites in an attempt to seize total control over your protectorate. I thought my actions were in service to the Lex, but in truth, only one person has ever benefitted from them. That mistake deserves no pardon, and I have earned my punishment."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sin darte tiempo a dirigirle la palabra, el Mariscal Strachs no suplica, si no que más bien te da una orden:{/n} «Júzgueme, {name}. Ahora que todo ha terminado, veo las cosas con claridad. Vultur nos usó a mí y al Adeptus Arbites para intentar apoderarse de su protectorado. Pensaba que estaba actuando al servicio de la Lex, pero en realidad solo una persona se ha beneficiado de mis acciones. Es un error que no merece perdón y me merezco el castigo».

languages.text: {n}ストラッチス将帥は、あなたが声をかける間もなく、嘆願するでもなく命じるように言った。{/n}「{name}、私を裁いてください。今は埃も舞っておらず、すべてがはっきりと見えます。ヴァルターは私と高等裁定局を利用して、あなたの保護領を完全に掌握しようとしました。私は自分の行動がレックスに奉仕するものだと考えていましたが、実際にはその恩恵に浴したのはただ一人でした。その過ちは赦されるに値せず、罰を受けています」
languages.original_text: {n}Without waiting for you to address him, Marshal Strachs does not plead so much as give you an order:{/n} "Judge me, {name}. Now that the dust has settled, I can see everything clearly. Vultur used me and the Adeptus Arbites in an attempt to seize total control over your protectorate. I thought my actions were in service to the Lex, but in truth, only one person has ever benefitted from them. That mistake deserves no pardon, and I have earned my punishment."

traits.locale_text: {n}ストラッチス将帥は、あなたが声をかける間もなく、嘆願するでもなく命じるように言った。{/n}「{name}、私を裁いてください。今は埃も舞っておらず、すべてがはっきりと見えます。ヴァルターは私と高等裁定局を利用して、あなたの保護領を完全に掌握しようとしました。私は自分の行動がレックスに奉仕するものだと考えていましたが、実際にはその恩恵に浴したのはただ一人でした。その過ちは赦されるに値せず、罰を受けています」

languages.text: {n}Ona dönmeni beklemeden konuşmaya devam eden Miralay Strachs yalvarmıyor, emir verircesine konuşuyor.{/n} "Beni yargılayın {name}. Ortalık yatıştığına göre artık her şeyi berrak bir şekilde görebiliyorum. Vultur, protektoranız üzerinde tam bir hâkimiyet elde etmek için beni ve Adeptus Arbites'i kullandı. Eylemlerimle Lex'e hizmet ettiğimi zannetmiştim fakat bunlardan fayda gören bir tek oymuş. Böyle bir hata affedilemez. Cezamı hak ettim."
languages.original_text: {n}Without waiting for you to address him, Marshal Strachs does not plead so much as give you an order:{/n} "Judge me, {name}. Now that the dust has settled, I can see everything clearly. Vultur used me and the Adeptus Arbites in an attempt to seize total control over your protectorate. I thought my actions were in service to the Lex, but in truth, only one person has ever benefitted from them. That mistake deserves no pardon, and I have earned my punishment."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ona dönmeni beklemeden konuşmaya devam eden Miralay Strachs yalvarmıyor, emir verircesine konuşuyor:{/n} "Beni yargılayın {name}. Ortalık yatıştığına göre artık her şeyi berrak bir şekilde görebiliyorum. Vultur, protektoranız üzerinde tam bir hâkimiyet elde etmek için beni ve Adeptus Arbites'i kullandı. Eylemlerimle Lex'e hizmet ettiğimi zannetmiştim fakat bunlardan fayda gören yalnızca tek bir kişiymiş. Böyle bir hata affedilemez. Cezamı hak ettim."
